source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_00<tab>Hihito has had enough of her husband's poor work ethic, and needs someone to whip him into shape.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_00<tab>ヒヒトは贅沢な暮らしをするために、旦那であるボボニマをチョコボのようにキリキリ働かせたいらしい。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_01<tab>Hihito is frustrated with her husband, whose lack of ambition is leading them to financial ruin. Speak with Bobonima outside the Coliseum and find some way to motivate him.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_01<tab>「ボボニマ」に話しかけ、彼の勤労意欲を鼓舞しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_02<tab>Bobonima is clearly annoyed with your meddling in his personal affairs. Nonetheless, he takes your presence to his advantage, and bids you help him by putting up Franz the Fair flyers inside the Coliseum.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_02<tab>ボボニマの仕事を手伝おう。コロセウムの壁に、「剣闘士フランツのポスター」を3枚貼ろう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_03<tab>You find suitable spots for all the flyers. Seek out Wolkan at the Gladiators' Guild and tell him how you helped Bobonima.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_03<tab>「剣闘士フランツのポスター」を貼り終えることができた。「剣術士ギルド」の受付にいる「ウォルカン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_04<tab>Your tale elicits Wolkan's gratitude as well as his sympathies, as the rocky relationship between Bobonima and his wife is anything but secret.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_SEQ_04<tab>仕事を手伝い、ウォルカンに褒められた。そして恐妻家ボボニマの給料もチョッピリ上がって、きっと彼の生活も楽になる……だろう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_TODO_01<tab>Post the flyers inside the Coliseum.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_TODO_01<tab>剣闘士フランツのポスターを貼る

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_1<tab>How can the Ossuary demand such exorbitant contributions every single moon!? It's outrageous, I tell you!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_1ああ、もう……ナル神様へのお布施って、
なんでこんなに高いのかしら！
しかも毎月毎月、やってらんないわ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_2<tab>Don't they understand that a woman has <var 1A 02 /var>needs<var 1A 01 /var>? How do they expect me to pay for rouge and Sunsilk dresses, <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> feed my marmot?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_2しかもパーティ用のドレスや美容やグルメ。
あと、ペットのピーちゃんのエサ代も……。
もう、破産寸前よ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_3<tab>Oh, if only I'd had the foresight to marry a more ambitious man! This is all <var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var> fault!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_3まったく、それもこれもぜ～んぶ旦那のせいよッ！
あの宿六の稼ぎが少ないから、
ロクな生活ができないのよッ！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_4<tab>If he just worked harder and showed some initiative, surely he would be rewarded─maybe even promoted!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_4ちょっと、アナタ！
ウチの旦那のとこに行って、「キリキリ働けッ！」って
尻のひとつでも蹴り飛ばしてくんないかしら？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_5<tab>If things don't improve, it won't be long before I join the beggars in Pearl Lane. Save me from this cruel fate, I beg of you! Speak with my husband, Bobonima, and find some way to motivate him! You should find him at the Coliseum entrance, wearing one of those ridiculous outfits.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_HIHITO_000_5旦那は「ボボニマ」っていう甲斐性ナシで、
今は「コロセウム」前あたりで
剣闘士のポスター貼りの仕事をしてるはずよ。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_10<tab>...Aye, I'm Bobonima. Congratulations, you've found the world's worst husband.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_10わ、私がボボニマですが……。
えっ、か、か、家内からの伝言ですって……!?
ひ、ひいぃ、かあちゃん許してぇ～！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_11<tab>That is, if you believe that harpy I have for a wife. She never cooks, she never cleans, she just gallivants around spending my hard-earned money. And now I see she's speaking ill of me to bloody strangers!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_11す、すみませんが冒険者さん！
この哀れな恐妻家を救うと思って、
ちょっと私の仕事を手伝ってくれませんか……？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_12<tab>Well, if you're hells-bent on meddling in my affairs, you can assist me by taking some of these Franz the Fair flyers and posting them on the walls inside the Coliseum.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_12現在、売り出し中の「剣闘士フランツのポスター」を、
「コロセウム」の「人目につきそうな壁」に貼ってほしいんです。
コロセウムへは、両側にある入り口のどちらからでも中に入れます。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_13<tab>I've <var 08 E3E90C0D ((<var 08 E3E90C05 ((got a long night)) ((got a long day)) /var>)) ((<var 08 E3E90C12 ((still got a long shift)) ((got a long night)) /var>)) /var> ahead of me standing out here, so I won't be getting to it any time soon. When you've finished, go and tell Wolkan at the Gladiators' Guild. He should give you something for your trouble.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_BOBONIMA_000_13ポスターを貼り終わったら、
「剣術士ギルド」の「ウォルカン」に報告してください。
そして私はきっと今日も徹夜です……はぁ……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_WOLKAN_000_20<tab>Ye helpin' Bobonima? Well, ain't that charitable of ye! Franz's gotten pretty popular of late, and his fans keep stealin' these flyers and takin' them home as souvenirs.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_WOLKAN_000_20フランツのポスターを貼ったって？
彼は現在赤丸急上昇中の人気剣闘士だからね、ご苦労様。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_WOLKAN_000_21<tab>...Ahhh, so ye've met Bobonima's wife. <var 1A 02 /var>Now<var 1A 01 /var> I understand. Sorry to hear ye got caught up in all that.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_WOLKAN_000_21……それにしても、ボボニマのやつ、
冒険者の手を借りるほど忙しいとは……大変だな。
今度の給料、ちょっとぐらい色を付けてやるか……。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_WOLKAN_000_22<tab>If ye ask me, they're made for one another. Not that it's my place to judge, mind. Anyroad, we appreciate yer help.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL004_00153_WOLKAN_000_22いやはや「結婚は人生の墓場」というが、
ボボニマはまさに生ける屍ってやつだな……。
少しは休まないと、ザル神様からお迎えがきちまうぜ。
